content: a round little plush bird with three difficulty options included in the pattern - two piece sew-together beginner - two piece no-sew advanced beginner - seamless one piece intermediate pattern also includes a colour change chart to create a european robin using 5 colours may be challenging this pattern makes a 2 5-3 inch bird which is good for using up scraps of yarn giving as a gift or random act of kindness or as a christmas decoration **you ll need ** - 3 5mm crochet hook - dk yarn in colour s of your choice - a small amount of scrap yarn in a contrasting colour for the beak and feet - toy stuffing a good way to use up scraps of yarn - needle scissors a few pins stitch markers - for the eyes black or contrasting and white embroidery thread or alternatively 4-5mm safety eyes or beads **pattern uses us terms ** single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet popcorn = popcorn increase = increase 2 single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease sc2 together shift stitch= at the end of the current round move stitch marker forward if right handed or back if left handed one stitch count the stitch after the marker as stitch 1 of the new round
